%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
rptconsignmentlevel
AS
SELECT
       c.*
      ,bc.lms_customer_name as billingcustomername
      ,dc.lms_customer_name as deliverycustomername
      ,ds.lms_sroute_description as deliverycustomersroutedescription
      ,dz.lms_zone_description as deliverycustomerzonedescription
      ,l.lms_location_description as deliverycustomerzonelocationdescription
      
FROM stconsignment c
LEFT JOIN stbillcustomer bc on bc.lms_customer_id = c.lms_consignment_billcust
LEFT JOIN stdeliverypickupcustomer dc on dc.lms_customer_id = c.lms_consignment_delivercustid
LEFT JOIN stsroute ds on ds.lms_sroute_id = dc.lms_customer_srouteid
LEFT JOIN stzone dz on dz.lms_zone_id =  ds.lms_sroute_zoneid
LEFT JOIN stlocation l on l.lms_location_id =  dz.lms_zone_locid 


WHERE lms_consignment_cdate >= to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01')

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
rptbillconsignmentlevel
AS
SELECT
     bc.*
    ,zr.description as zonedescription
    ,cust.lms_customer_name as billingcustomername

FROM dbobillconsignmentr bc 
LEFT JOIN stbillcustomer cust on cust.lms_customer_id = bc.BillCust
LEFT JOIN dbobillzoneroute zr  on zr.ID = bc.DeliverRouteID
WHERE bc.cdate1 >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01'))
AND bc.chargeweight > 0
AND coalesce(bc.RouteMissingInd,0) = 0

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
rptbillconsignmentexceptionlevel
AS
SELECT
     bc.*
    ,zr.description as zonedescription
    ,cust.lms_customer_name as billingcustomername

FROM dbobillexceptionr bc 
LEFT JOIN stbillcustomer cust on cust.lms_customer_id = bc.BillCust
LEFT JOIN dbobillzoneroute zr  on zr.ID = bc.DeliverRouteID
WHERE bc.cdate1 >= (to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01'))
AND bc.chargeweight != 0
AND coalesce(bc.RouteMissingInd,0) = 0
